no.patternsolutions.javann
Class Kohonen

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      no.patternsolutions.javann.NeuralNet
          no.patternsolutions.javann.Kohonen
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Kohonen
extends NeuralNet

Kohonens self-organizing network consists of two layers that can organize a topological map from a random starting point.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Kohonen

public Kohonen()
Constructs a Kohonen network without setting the competing layer. The network has no default initiating of the competing layer, so the method setCompetingLayer(double[][]) has to be runned before the network can be trained with trainPatterns(double[][]).

See Also:
setCompetingLayer(double[][])

Kohonen

public Kohonen(double[][] comp)
Constructs a Kohonen network with the given set of competing nodes.

Parameters:
comp - a table of vectors (comp[node][vector-value])
See Also:
setCompetingLayer(double[][])

getLearnRate

public double getLearnRate()
Returns the learn rate of the network.

Returns:
the learn rate

getMatchType

public boolean getMatchType()
Tells if match is found by maximum weighted sum or minimum euclidic distance.

Returns:
false if maximum weighted sum is used.

getNeighbourRange

public double getNeighbourRange()
Gets the initial neighbour range. When the network is training, the distance between the winning node and all other nodes in the competing layer are measured. If this distance is less than the value given by the neighbour range, the node is updated. Default is 0.4.

Returns:
the neighbour range. This is usually a number between 0.0 and 1.0.

getNeighbourRangeDecrease

public int getNeighbourRangeDecrease()
Tells how the neighbour range is changed or not changed during training. These different changes are "constant", "linear" or "exponential" decrese.

Returns:
either the Integer "constant", "linear" or " exponential".

isDecreseLearnRateEnabled

public boolean isDecreseLearnRateEnabled()
Tells if the learn rate shall decrese linear over the iterations. Default is false.

Returns:
true if the learn rate is decresing, false if not.
See Also:
setDecreaseLearnRate(boolean enabled)

isRandomUpdateEnabled

public boolean isRandomUpdateEnabled()
Tells if random update is enabled. Default is false.

Returns:
true if random update is enabled, false if not.
See Also:
setRandomUpdate(boolean enabled)

Test the network with a set of input vectors.

Returns:

setCompetingLayer

public void setCompetingLayer(double[][] comp)
Sets the initial values for the competing layer. When the network is training, or just running, the nodes in the competing layer will compete to find the vector closest to the input vector.

Parameters:
comp - a table of vectors (comp[node][vector-value])

getCompetingLayer

public KohonenNode[] getCompetingLayer()

setDecreaseLearnRate

public void setDecreaseLearnRate(boolean enabled)
Enables linear decreasing of the learn rate over the iterations. Default is false .

Parameters:
enabled - true if the learn rate shall decrease, false if not.

setLearnRate

public void setLearnRate(double value)
Initiates the value of the learn rate to value. Default is 0.2

Parameters:
value - the value of the learn rate.

setMatchType

public void setMatchType(boolean type)
Sets the type of method used to find a match node in the competing layer of the Kohonen network. If type is false, the match is the node that has the maximum weighted input. If type is true, the match node if the node that has the minimum euclidic distance to the input vector. It's possible to use the constants EUCLIDIC_DISTANCE and WEIGHTED_SUM as parameters.

Parameters:
type - the type of method used to find a match.

setNeighbourDecrease

public void setNeighbourDecrease(int constraint)
Specifies how the neighbour range is supposed to change. The three choices are:
  • Constant (no decreasing). Use "constant" or Kohonen.CONSTANT as parameter.
  • Linear decrease. Use "linear" or Kohonen.LINEAR_DECRESE as parameter.
  • Exponential decrease. Use "exponential" or Kohonen.EXPONENTIAL_DECRESE as parameter.

Parameters:
constraint - a String representing the method of changing the neighbour range.

setNeighbourRange

public void setNeighbourRange(double neighbourRange)
Sets the initial neighbour range. When the network is training, the distance between the winning node and all other nodes in the competing layer are measured. If this distance is less than the value given by the neighbour range, the node is updated. Default is 0.4.

Parameters:
neighbourRange - the new neighbour range. This should be between 0.0 and 1.0.

setRandomUpdate

public void setRandomUpdate(boolean enabled)
Enables updating of the network randomly. If it's not randomly, it will be updated in sequental order.

Parameters:
enabled - true if random update shall be enabled, false if not.

trainPatternOnce

protected boolean[] trainPatternOnce(double[] input,
                                     int iteration,
                                     int iterations)
Trains a pattern with only one iteration.

Parameters:
input - the vector that the Kohonen network shall train on.
iteration - the current iteration will be affected.
iterations - the total number of iterations shall be changed.
Returns:
a boolean table with the same length as the input layer where all the nodes that were affected is set to true.

trainPatterns

public void trainPatterns(double[][] inputs)
Trains a set of patterns for the Kohonen network.

Parameters:
inputs - a table of different patterns, consisting of one or several double -values. This input-table must have the same number of vector-values as the competing layer, but it doesn't have to be the same length. (comp[][sameValue], inputs[][sameValue])
